title: Hansel and Gretel by Engelbert Humperdinck
creator_credit: Opera Australia, ABC-TV (Australia), Virginia Lumsden and Elijah Moshinsky
brief_description: Based on the Brothers Grimm fairytale, Englebert Humperdinck’s opera adaptation of “Hansel and Gretel” is for both adults and children alike. This fantastic Opera Australia production of the story provides a strong visual interpretation of the opera, with wonderfully surreal sets designed by Mark Thompson. Performers include: Suzanne Johnston, Christine Douglas, Elizabeth Campbell, Malcolm Donnelly, Gail Robertson. The Australian Opera (Australia) conducted by Johannes Fritzch. Staged by Elijah Moshinsky. Sung in English Translation.
